name: Dead Man's Phone
description:
Play the lead in a BAFTA-nominated crime drama. You are a London Yard detective who solves murders through the smartphone of victims.

**Dead Man's Phone is reinventing gaming for the crime podcast age** WIRED

Imagine having the smartphone of a murder victim. Finding clues in their personal messages, photos & apps. Introducing Dead Man’s Phone – a police crime drama – starring YOU as the lead character.

- Search the victim’s personal messages, photos & social media for clues
- Command your police team on the ground and in the lab
- Conduct *FaceTime* Interrogations
- Make Calls
- Affect National Headlines
- Find the Killer
- Multiple endings – you choices matter


Run an ENTIRE murder investigation from your phone.

If you enjoy Netflix crime dramas or true crime podcats, you will be hooked by Dead Man’s Phone.

--

Dead Man’s Phone is a totally live-action experience featuring an ensemble cast of actors.

The app pushes the boundaries of immersive storytelling – your detective partner in the narrative, DCI Michael Sutherland, is voiced by a REAL homicide detective, Detective Sergeant Simeon Cryer.

Det Cryer has spent 20 years as homicide detective in the Bristol Major Crime Team pioneering the use of data in crime-solving.

SEASON 1

16-year-old, Jerome Jacobs, is thrown from the twelfth floor of a London tower block. Jerome is a smart, talented and popular young man. His death stuns the community.

Witnesses believe they heard Jerome shout the word ‘redman’ before he fell...

Run the Jerome Jacobs murder investigation from your phone. Uncover the mystery of redman & bring his killer to justice.

Search Jerome’s personal messages, photos & social media for clues
Experience & understand Jerome’s life in a unique and powerful way
Become intimately connected with Jerome’s family and friends
See your choices affect national news headlines
